title: Habitat 67 and Habitat 2.0?? Iconic Canadian housing complex and its comeback
description: You simply can't leave Montréal without checking out Habitat 67 for Montréal’s world Expo in 1967. Until the visit, I didn't realize that Habitat 67 echoes with Metabolism, for instance, that are constructed...

title: Batiment 7, a self-managed community space acquired by the citizens
description: Bâtiment 7 is a historic industrial building that has been converted into a hub for alternative project spaces and for people to gather. It's located in a neighborhood called Pointe-Saint-Charles and is...
